body_html: i've been able to build a tensorflow wheel for python 3.6 for TX1, but i cannot build tensorflow-GPU support successfully. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45825708/error-building-tensorflow-gpu-1-1-0-on-nvidia-jetson-tx1-aarch64 for details.
body_text: i've been able to build a tensorflow wheel for python 3.6 for TX1, but i cannot build tensorflow-GPU support successfully.  See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45825708/error-building-tensorflow-gpu-1-1-0-on-nvidia-jetson-tx1-aarch64  for details.
body: i've been able to build a tensorflow wheel for python 3.6 for TX1, but i cannot build tensorflow-GPU support successfully.  See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45825708/error-building-tensorflow-gpu-1-1-0-on-nvidia-jetson-tx1-aarch64  for details.
